text:
The call to invalidate auth code tokens was removed by mistake and thus providers using the new release will not have request_validator.invalidate_authorization_called.

I've implemented but not pushed a fix and am in the process of adding more rigorous unittests to prevent this from happening in the future. Expect this fix to be rolled out in a mini release tomorrow.

Thanks for reporting Lorenzo - https://plus.google.com/u/0/+LorenzoGilS%C3%A1nchez/posts/WfUxYxEAwDE?cfem=1
title: invalidate_authorization_code not invoked in 0.7.x

text:
Actually the root cause is not test coverage at all. Instead it seems that work in progress locally modified but not committed or pushed changes were included in the push. This is a human error on my part and will create a bug to auto prevent this from happening in a future.

I will go ahead and release 0.7.2 without these unintended changes.
